name: Portable Handheld Steam Garment Steamer Foldable: Effortless Wrinkle Clothes Steam Iron Removal 20-Second Fast Heat-up, 1200W, 120ml Water Tank for Home & Travel (120V Only, Not for Europe)
about_this_item: Quick and Powerful: The 1200-watt Travel Steamer heats up in just 20 seconds, delivering powerful steam that removes wrinkles from clothes in no time.
Effortless Operation: This travel steamer is easy to use, suitable for novices and experienced users alike. Its quick heat-up and powerful steam output make ironing a breeze.

Portable Design: Featuring a folding design that makes it compact and easy to carry, this travel steamer comes with a storage bag and is perfect for use in 110v-120V countries like the USA and Canada.
Versatile and Safe: The travel steamer can be safely used on a wide variety of fabrics such as clothes, curtains, furniture, and toys, making it a versatile tool for all your steaming needs.

Careful Maintenance Required: After using the steamer, remove the water tank and heat it for 10 seconds until there's no steam. Give the unit 10 minutes of rest for every 20 minutes of continuous heating to produce steam and fully protect the item. Please note that this travel steamer is only for US Voltage 110~120 volt.

title: Effortless
content: Wish I had taken a picture of my curtain before and then after: it really was effortless! Last time I moved, I IRONED the cotten drapes, and after an hour of pressing, they were still wrinkled! This time I tried this steamer, and I was done in about 15 minutes. Going on a trip next week, and this will definitely go along: the foldable makes it easy to tuck in a suitcase (actually, it will go into a shoe!) (A plus: it isn't really heavy, and I didn't have 'boil-over' like my old steamer did. No burns!)
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

title: Verified Purchase
content: I saw an influencer demonstrating this steamer which convinced me to give it a try. I’ve purchased more expensive steamers which didn’t do nearly the job this compact steamer does.  The brush attachment really is a plus. I don’t know why but using the brush attachment while steaming clothes makes all the difference in how well the wrinkles come out.  My daughter borrowed my steamer and agreed it’s the best steamer ever. It is very portable, heats up in 10 seconds and easy to use. I do use distilled water in mine to prevent lime buildup which comes from tap water. If I was traveling I would use tap water.  Don’t hesitate to buy this steamer. I think you will love it.
